header.name: Cristhian Guerrero Zaldívar
header.title: Founder & CEO at FlowMind Studio LLC — Full-Stack / Web Systems / SEO & Conversion

now.title: Current Role / Now
now.intro: Founder & CEO — FlowMind Studio LLC (Austin, TX). I build conversion-first websites and growth systems for local businesses.
now.description: I lead strategy, execution, and systems: conversion websites, ad landing pages, Google Business Profile optimization, technical performance, CRO, and lightweight automations for lead handling and follow-up.

items.title: Conversion Websites
items.body: Multi-section business websites designed to convert traffic into qualified leads.

items.title: Landing Pages for Ads
items.body: Campaign-specific pages with clear messaging and measurable CTA flows.

items.title: Local SEO + GBP
items.body: Google Business Profile optimization, local relevance signals, and review strategy.

items.title: Lead Automation
items.body: Lead alerts, follow-up triggers, and lightweight CRM-ready workflows.

items.title: Brand & Graphic Design
items.body: Logos, visual identity systems, and practical brand assets for digital channels.

about.title: About
about.body: I bring 10+ years of experience across technology, operations, and leadership. Today my focus is building performance-driven web systems that connect engineering, SEO, and conversion strategy into outcomes local businesses can feel in pipeline and revenue.

services.title: Services
services.body: Available for consulting, audits, and full builds. I can join from strategy to implementation and optimization.

marketing.title: Marketing & CRO
items: Funnels, offer framing, and lead quality optimization
